text:
File rivet/packages/tclrivet/parser.tcl containes the following line:

set auto_path "[file dirname [info script]] $auto_path"

This fails if the file is in a path fith spaces and shimmers bad due to the conversion from and to lists. One replacement would be:

set auto_path [linsert $auto_path 0 [file dirname [info script]]]

Untested by me, don't know the purpose of the file.

Thank you,
Harald
creator: harald.oehlmann@elmicron.de
